name: use-kbd
title: useKBD
description:
Custom hook that detects the operating system (Mac vs. Windows/Linux) and provides a normalized map of keyboard keys (e.g., mapping "Meta" to "Command" on Mac and "Ctrl" on Windows). ```tsx const { isMac, getKbdKey } = useKbd(); // Returns "⌘" on Mac, "Ctrl" on Windows const metaSymbol = getKbdKey('meta'); return
Press {metaSymbol} + C to copy
; ```
